meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasantly stimulating or exciting to the taste or mind.
meanings.sent1: The piquantnesses of the dish left a delightful taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the piquantnesses of spicy food.
meanings.sent3: Her witty jokes added a touch of piquantnesses to the conversation.
meanings.sent4: The piquantnesses of the mystery novel kept me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent5: The piquantnesses of the music filled the room with energy.

meanings.definition: The state of having a sharp or pungent flavor or smell.
meanings.sent1: The piquantnesses of the cheese made my nose tingle.
meanings.sent2: The soup's piquantnesses made my eyes water.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected piquantnesses of the perfume caught me by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The piquantnesses of the chili pepper hit me like a fiery explosion.
meanings.sent5: The piquantnesses of the vinegar added a zesty kick to the salad.
